properties.flagItems: This is an authorised configuration item^1|

properties.hintText: Click here to select a default profile code to use for this item when logging requests

properties.hintText: Click here to select the configuration type for this item.

properties.flagItems: Inherits CI type's Service Request Definitions^1|
Show requests where this item is being changed (Unticked shows requests where this item is being impacted)^1|
Show requests where this item is part of the error (Unticked shows requests where this item is being impacted)^1|

appearance.caption: When logging an incident or problem, if the support options have not already been set then these preferred settings will be applied when the item is linked to the request.

properties.flagItems: Show requests where this item is being released (Unticked shows requests where this item is being impacted)^1|
